tool.help:
**Overview** A program to automatically generate ISA-Tab metadata files from metabolomics raw XML (mzML and imzML) data files.
Additional meta-information not found within the mzML file can be added either through a JSON file or via the drop down menus. However, it is recommended that the mzML2ISA tool is used to create a semi-completed ISA-Tab file structure that is further annotated using ISAcreator https://github.com/ISA-tools/ISAcreator
